title: Premiere: Cadence Kid – Hold On Me
content:
With the summer months just around the corner, it’s high time to start preparing those playlists perfect for the warmer, longer days.

This new jam from Cadence Kid is an absolute surefire winner, the ideal mix of upbeat melodies and tastefully cheesy lyrics, all soaked in a healthy dose of Phoenix indebted pop charisma. Check out Hold On Me below, released 3rd June 2016.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
